document_data.name: Elmonitae
document_data.mainbody: '''Elmonitae''' was a moonlet in the [[Tears of Selûne]]. It was a [[neogi]] stronghold.
document_data.Defenses: The asteroid was guarded by patrolling [[neogi mindspider]]s.
document_data.History: Sometime in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]], the neogi had imprisoned 100 captives on Elmonitae: 60 [[elf|elves]] and 40 [[human]]s from [[Wa]]. The [[Tsunami (spelljammer)|tsunami]] ''[[Storm of Honor]]'', commanded by [[Daimyo]] [[Akahu Nagasa]], fought against six [[neogi mindspider]]s, destroying four and causing the remaining two to flee after a 28-hour-long battle. The ship then landed on Elmonitae and rescued the prisoners. The elven captives were then transferred to the [[armada (spelljammer)|armada]] ''[[Wings of Glory]]'', ushering a five-year-long peace between the elves and the nation of Wa.
